text:
Even though I set 

   driver.setLogger(new Log4JLogger(myLog4JLogger));

i get the following outputs on the system console:

-------
[WARNING] Screen logger not set - Using ConsoleLogger.
[INFO] Using org.apache.xerces.parsers.SAXParser as SAX2 Parser
[INFO] setting up fonts
[ERROR] unknown font ,normal,normal so defaulted font to any
[ERROR] unknown font ,normal,normal so defaulted font to any
[ERROR] unknown font ,normal,normal so defaulted font to any
...
--------
creator: mhilpert@gmx.de

text:
You forgot:
MessageHandler.setScreenLogger(logger);

as described here: http://xml.apache.org/fop/embedding.html

Yes, we know it's strange. This will be improved in the redesign.
creator: jeremias@apache.org
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
